====== generateId ======
^ API ^ Package ^ Class ^ phpDocumentor ^ Last reviewed ^ Doc status ^
| {{http://api.joomla.org/media/images/package.png?nolink}} [[references:joomla.framework|Joomla.Framework]] | {{http://api.joomla.org/media/images/package.png?nolink}} [[references:joomla.framework/#Cache|Cache]] | {{http://api.joomla.org/media/images/Class.png?nolink}}[[JCache|JCache]] | [[http://api.joomla.org/Joomla-Framework/Cache/JCache.html#generateId|JCache->generateId]] | Never | Public review |

Make a control key with the string containing data.
===== Syntax =====
string generateId	( **$data**, **$controlType** )
| **$data** | string | is a string from which to create the control key. |
| **$controlType** | string | is a string containing the type of control. This can be 'md5', 'crc32' or 'strlen'. This parameter is optional and if omitted defaults to 'md5'. |

===== Examples =====
<code php|Example>
$cache =& JFactory::getCache();

echo "Control key of JClass: " . $cache->generateId( 'JClass', 'crc32' );
</code>
might produce:
<code php|Result>
Control key of JClass:  -173455057
</code>

~~DISCUSSION~~
